Text:
not trying to complain, but why put it in so many parts? couldn't you put them into one file like people usually do?

anyway, thanks for the up.
Indeed you were the only one upping it. But you might as well not have bothered. Watching an episode 2 minutes at the time? Pointless and useless.

Looks like there's a tv rip version of this one labelled as episode 10.

Cheers anyway mate, especially for making episode 8 available when no one else did, since those of us outside the U.S can't watch them on the website. Much appreciated.
